metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36227 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was discovered in OpenLDAP before 2.4.57 leading to an infinite loop in slapd with the cancel_extop Cancel operation, resulting in denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-36227` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libldap-2.5-0 - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libldap-common - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
slapd - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
slapd-contrib - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openldap package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
